raw_comment:
In looking at this graph, I notice how players of color make up way over 50% besides baseball in major sports leagues. Because of this, I wonder why the number of head coaches of color are substantially lower than number of players. Is this lower number because of race or is it just that way because? This impacts my community because if coaches are mostly white because of race, that will seriously damage our country. Every person in America deserves a chance to pursue whatever career or dream they wish without race playing a role. 
New Headline: "Does Race Play a Role In Sports Teams?"
ace_sentences: In major sports leagues, players of color make up more than 50 percent in many sports.
The number of head coaches of color is substantially lower than the number of players of color.
I wonder why the number of head coaches of color is substantially lower.
I ask whether race causes this lower number.
I ask whether other factors cause this lower number.
If race causes coaches to be mostly white, then this will seriously damage the country.
Every person in America deserves a chance to pursue any career.
Race must not play a role in this chance.
The headline is: Does race play a role in sports teams?
